snippet.title: Calmed by the Dark Shin Neon - Teaser Trailer
snippet.description:
Add to your #steam wishlist:https://store.steampowered.com/app/2411920/Calmed_by_the_Dark_Shin_Neon
Add to your #itchio collection:https://calmed-by-the-dark-games.itch.io/calmed-by-the-dark-shin-neon

Enter a world of darkness and danger in Calmed by the Dark Shin Neon
Calmed by the Dark Shin Neon is a Action-RPG set in a future where creatures, known as Biomorphics, live between humans. Being a danger to mankind, a organization of hunters was funded to keep track of them...

In this action-packed game, you'll take on the role of Tommy, a new hunter tasked with protecting the city and stopping the Biomorphic threat. With a mission-based structure and a variety of weapons to choose from, you'll embark on thrilling missions to upgrade your arsenal and uncover the truth behind the Biomorphics.
